title: Players could no longer choose regions that are "too far away" from where they're located.
body:
- Players could no longer choose regions that are "too far away" from where they're located.

Just think about it, no more people DC-ing like 10 times and saying "OHHHHH SRRY LAG, MY PING IS LIEK 9999"

Stop complaining and CHOOSE region near you.

I'm not even judging, CHOOSE a region near your hometown, you're ruining others experience,

- I put this under Gameplay because its affecting gameplay.



If you're from europe use EUNE/EUW servers, they're just like NA servers. i guarantee your ping will go lower by around 150.

replies.body: So i have friends in eu and my lover are stationed over there, therefore i use it, I can EASILY play with 159 ping. So idk. Shit idea.
Not all lag is caused by that though, so it wouldn't solve most lag issues tbh.

^^^^
this.

most people lag from having shite internet, not nessicerilly being across a continent.
Being across a continent will just make it significantly worse, however.
but what if i want to play against koreans to learn their ways and not being forever silver 5 XD
